mapper.insert: insert into tb_tesexiaozhen( feaname, feanumber, fealevel, feabatch, fearelation, feaprovince, feacity, featown, feagenre, feaindustry, feaplaninvest, feaschedule, featarget, feaplanarea, feaplancontent, feacoreindustry, fealeadcom, fealeadname, fealeadtel, feacooperate, feapartner, feapartname, feaparttel, feapartway, feapartmoney, fearegtime, feaendtime, feapartconten, feacontact, feapost, feacontacttel, feacitypic, featownpic, feascopeopic, feaplanpic, featotalplanpic, feadetailplanpic, feacreator, updatetime) values( #{feaname}, #{feanumber}, #{fealevel}, #{feabatch}, #{fearelation}, #{feaprovince}, #{feacity}, #{featown}, #{feagenre}, #{feaindustry}, #{feaplaninvest}, #{feaschedule}, #{featarget}, #{feaplanarea}, #{feaplancontent}, #{feacoreindustry}, #{fealeadcom}, #{fealeadname}, #{fealeadtel}, #{feacooperate}, #{feapartner}, #{feapartname}, #{feaparttel}, #{feapartway}, #{feapartmoney}, #{fearegtime}, #{feaendtime}, #{feapartconten}, #{feacontact}, #{feapost}, #{feacontacttel}, #{feacitypic}, #{featownpic}, #{feascopeopic}, #{feaplanpic}, #{featotalplanpic}, #{feadetailplanpic}, #{feacreator}, now() )
mapper.select:
select a.feanumber,a.feaname,a.fealevel,a.feaid, b.name as feaprovince,c.name as feacity,d.name as featown from Tb_tesexiaozhen a LEFT JOIN tb_area_province b on a.feaprovince=b.code LEFT JOIN tb_area_city c on a.feacity=c.code LEFT JOIN tb_area_town d on a.featown=d.code where 1=1
and (a.feaname like '%${search}%' or a.feanumber like '%${search}%' or a.fealevel like '%${search}%')
order by a.createtime desc,a.feaid desc
select t.* from Tb_tesexiaozhen t where t.feaid=#{feaid}
mapper.update: update Tb_tesexiaozhen set feaname=#{feaname}, fealevel=#{fealevel}, feanumber=#{feanumber}, feabatch=#{feabatch}, fearelation=#{fearelation}, feaprovince=#{feaprovince}, feacity=#{feacity}, featown=#{featown}, feagenre=#{feagenre}, feaindustry=#{feaindustry}, feaplaninvest=#{feaplaninvest}, feaschedule=#{feaschedule}, featarget=#{featarget}, feaplanarea=#{feaplanarea}, feaplancontent=#{feaplancontent}, feacoreindustry=#{feacoreindustry}, fealeadcom=#{fealeadcom}, fealeadname=#{fealeadname}, fealeadtel=#{fealeadtel}, feacooperate=#{feacooperate}, feapartner=#{feapartner}, feapartname=#{feapartname}, feaparttel=#{feaparttel}, feapartway=#{feapartway}, feapartmoney=#{feapartmoney}, fearegtime=#{fearegtime}, feaendtime=#{feaendtime}, feapartconten=#{feapartconten}, feacontact=#{feacontact}, feapost=#{feapost}, feacontacttel=#{feacontacttel}, feacitypic=#{feacitypic}, featownpic=#{featownpic}, feascopeopic=#{feascopeopic}, feaplanpic=#{feaplanpic}, featotalplanpic=#{featotalplanpic}, feadetailplanpic=#{feadetailplanpic}, updatetime=now() where feaid=#{feaid}
